ai-mil3.3.11:1.2_0: “Because there are characteristics, choices, and consciousness.”
ai-mil3.3.11:2.2_0: “Great king, having made such a person, and making themselves choices, they’d be reborn in the underworld. ...”
ai-mil3.3.11:2.3_0: In the same way, some person, when their body breaks up, after death, were reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-mil3.3.11:2.4_0: Those who leave without leave after death are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-mil3.3.11:3.1_0: Or suppose a person was to take a snake with ghee carcass out of ghee, oil, honey, and shopped it, would be happy to be happy if,
ai-mil3.3.11:3.2_0: In the same way, some person, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-mil3.3.11:3.3_0: Those who leave without coming out of the body, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-mil3.3.11:3.4_0: Thus, great king, has the characteristics of choices.”
ai-mil3.3.11:5.1_0: Intentional activities is the eleventh characteristic.
